article_title: Marco Rubio campaign stop attracts local crowd
article_text:
Joplin, MO (64801)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then mainly cloudy during the afternoon with thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. High 74F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms during the evening will give way to cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 64F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: Susan Redden sredden@joplinglobe.com

og.description: Presidential candidate Marco Rubio converted at least one of the undecided voters in the crowd during a stop Friday in Joplin.
